sentences.en: After all, your competitors are financially rational.
sentences.cn: 至少你的对手财政上是理性的。

sentences.en: And I know it at Princeton, when you came, the Steve Forbes decided to no longer support the university financially. There have been protests at some of your talks.
sentences.cn: 我知道当您刚刚来到普林斯顿大学的时候，福布斯集团决定不再支持,大学的财政开支，那时，有一些人,在您的讲座上抗议。

sentences.en: And you have to find a way to support yourself financially while you follow your passion.
sentences.cn: 并且当你跟着你的激情走时，你必须找到一个办法在财政上支持你自己。

sentences.en: Buy a policy only from an insurance company that is financially sound.
sentences.cn: 一定要从财务状况良好的保险公司购买保险。

sentences.en: Financially things are a bit tight.
sentences.cn: 经济上有点吃紧。

sentences.en: Financially, things are a bit tight.
sentences.cn: 经济上情况有点吃紧。

sentences.en: He is embarrassed financially.
sentences.cn: 他经济受窘.

sentences.en: He is financially able to establish a home.
sentences.cn: 他在经济上有能力成家.

sentences.en: I am one of the few young women who has made it as a writer financially and internationally.
sentences.cn: 我是为数不多的既获得财富又享有国际知名度的年轻女作家之一。

sentences.en: Indeed, the Beijing Olympics could be one of the most financially successful games in terms of revenue receipts.
sentences.cn: 事实上，根据其岁入，北京奥运会有可能成为财政上最为成功的一届奥运会。

sentences.en: Jennifer believes she will move out on her own when she is financially able to support herself.
sentences.cn: 珍妮弗相信，当自己有钱养活自己时，就会搬出去单住。

sentences.en: Life for the successful doctor can be emotionally and financially rewarding.
sentences.cn: 对于事业有成的医生来说，生活在精神和物质两方面都能令人满足。

sentences.en: Plan to do things that physically challenge you and you will impress someone who is able to keep up with you physically, emotionally and financially.
sentences.cn: 计划做一些带来身体挑战的运动，给有能力在身体上、精神上和财政上跟随你的她/他留下一个好印象。

sentences.en: She accused him of ruining her financially with his taste for the high life.
sentences.cn: 她指责他为了追求奢华的生活致使她倾家荡产。

sentences.en: She had had the foresight to prepare herself financially in case of an accident.
sentences.cn: 她有先见之明，经济上作了准备以防万一发生事故。

sentences.en: She would like to be more financially independent.
sentences.cn: 她想在经济上更加独立。

sentences.en: She's been struggling financially for years.
sentences.cn: 她多年来一直生活拮据。

sentences.en: The company was not financially strong enough to be floated on the Stock Exchange.
sentences.cn: 该公司资金不够雄厚，无法上市。

sentences.en: The firm is rock-solid financially.
sentences.cn: 这个公司经济实力非常可靠。

sentences.en: The real value, medically and financially, therefore lies in the proteins.
sentences.cn: 因此, 从医学上和商业上考虑, 真正的价值就在于蛋白质.

words.tran_cn: 筹措资金；财政管理；从事金融活动（finance的ing形式）
欺骗；从事欺骗性金融活动
